title: Homescreen Permaloading Bug
body:
Hey Community!
Since Patch 5.14 came out , my Homescreen looks like this: 
http://www.bilder-upload.eu/show.php?file=4f0fd8-1437653668.png

It seems to permaload something that just doesnt come.
I only see the Picture of the new 2 Summoner Icons, but there are no articles that i can click.
Actually the headlines of the articles are visible if i mark the black background, like this:
http://www.bilder-upload.eu/show.php?file=6adcd8-1437653696.png

Can someone help me? :)

Thank you.

(i already tried to repair-> didnt work tho)
